name: Fito
description:
A simple black and white pixel art game about being a tree. 

Build your tree. Manage your resources. How many days can you live?

Made for the Black and White Game Jam #8! All gameplay is programmed using the Unity Tilemap system. Grayscale is accomplished by alpha shifting pure black tiles on a white background. 

Hope you enjoy!

P.S. My longest run so far is 4 days! Post your longest runs in the comments below. The nights are pretty brutal.
